definition: to slacken off/to take it easy
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to leak (gas)/to be discouraged/to despair/(disparaging) pathetic/to vent one's anger/(of a tire) to be flat
to give up halfway (idiom); leave sth unfinished
there is nothing the determined person can't accomplish (idiom)/persistence will overcome

(idiom) to blame the gods and accuse others
to guard against pride and impatience (idiom); to remain modest and keep cool
a really determined person will find a solution (idiom); where there's a will, there's a way
